mapper.select: SELECT cp.cp_type, p.project_name, TO_CHAR(ch.date, 'YYYY. MM. DD') AS date_str, TO_CHAR(ch.date + INTERVAL '1 year', 'YYYY. MM. DD') AS end_date_str, ch.amount, ch.discounted_price AS price FROM carbon_hists ch INNER JOIN carbon_products cp ON ch.cp_id = cp.cp_id INNER JOIN projects p ON cp.project_id = p.project_id WHERE ch.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ch.date DESC
